SELECT user_no as no, user_name as name, user_id as id, user_tel as tel, user_reg_date as regDate FROM users WHERE user_del_yn = 'N'
AND user_id like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
AND user_name like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
AND user_tel = #keyword#
AND user_reg_date >= #fromDate#
AND user_reg_date < to_date(#toDate#) + 1
ORDER BY user_no desc
